summary: Filter out reads that do not have an original quality quality score (OQ) tag
description:
The OQ tag can be added during the base recalibration process in order to preserve original information.

Usage example

     java -jar GenomeAnalysisTk.jar \
         -T ToolName \
         -R reference.fasta \
         -I input.bam \
         -o output.file \
         -rf NoOriginalQualityScores
name: NoOriginalQualityScoresFilter
